long_description: With extended length for long torsos, the Deuter ACT Trail 38 EL pack offers great craftsmanship in a sturdy and light daypack that hauls your gear on day hikes, summit scrambles and technical routes. Aircontact back system with Delrin(R) U-frame rod allows warm air to escape and fresh air to circulate between your back and the pack. 3D air-mesh fabric lining adds breathability to the contoured, padded shoulder straps; anatomic hipbelt wraps body, stabilizing the pack's lateral movements. Easy-access main compartment with two-way zippers offers plenty of room for an all-day hike; reservoir sleeve and drink tube port accommodate a reservoir (sold separately). Hipbelt pocket holds snacks; mesh side pocket stores water bottle, headlamp, gloves or sunscreen; lid pocket holds a map, compass or GPS, spare batteries and other small items. Large stuff-it pocket on the front holds rain gear or other bulky items; integrated, tuck-away rain cover stands ready to protect your load from sudden downpours. Compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying; simple, lightweight tool loops let you quickly stash trekking poles and ice axes. The Deuter ACT Trail 38 EL pack is made with lightweight and abrasion-resistant 210-denier ripstop nylon.
short_description: With extended length for long torsos, the Deuter ACT Trail 38 EL pack offers great craftsmanship in a sturdy and light daypack that hauls your gear on day hikes, summit scrambles and technical routes.
